tool_description: Get data for top hockey leagues and tournaments as NHL, IIHF World Championships and Olympic Games.
name: hockey-LIVE.sk data
title: hockey-LIVE.sk data

api_list.name: Team details
api_list.description: Get team roster and games for the specified league and year

api_list.name: Game report
api_list.description: Get game score, goals, penalties and team statistics for a certain game ID

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID of the game from the game´s schedule

optional_parameters.name: tz
optional_parameters.description: Show the times and dates in the provided timezone

api_list.name: Last game report by teams
api_list.description: Get the last game report of the two teams

optional_parameters.name: tz
optional_parameters.description: Show the times and dates in the provided timezone

api_list.name: Games schedule
api_list.description: Get games list for certain league and year

optional_parameters.name: tz
optional_parameters.description: Show the times and dates in the provided timezone

api_list.name: Player statistics
api_list.description: Get player historical statistics by his name or his ID

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Name of the player or his ID

api_list.name: Team standings
api_list.description: Get current or historical team standings for the certain league and year
